properties.entry: SELECT PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_DATE , PRODUCT_FILE_RENAME FROM PRODUCT, PRODUCT_FILE WHERE PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO = PRODUCT_FILE.PRODUCT_NO AND CATE2_NO = 1 AND PRODUCT_FILE_ORIGIN_NAME LIKE '%main%'
SELECT PRODUCT_NO , PRODUCT_BRAND , PRODUCT_NAME , PRODUCT_PRICE , PRODUCT_DETAIL , PRODUCT_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ? AND PRODUCT_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT PRODUCT_FILE_NO , PRODUCT_FILE_RENAME FROM PRODUCT_FILE WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
SELECT OPTION_NO , PRODUCT_NO , OPTION_NAME , OPTION_PRICE , OPTION_STOCK FROM PRODUCT_OPTION WHERE PRODUCT_NO = ?
SELECT CATE2_NO , CATE1_NO , CATE2_NAME FROM PRODUCT_CATE2 WHERE PRODUCT_CATE1 = ?
SELECT , PRODUCT_PRICE , OPTION_PRICE FROM PRODUCT_OPTION PO, PRODUCT P WHERE PO.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO AND PO.OPTION_NO=?
